text: I'm going to go ahead and show you all of the action. There's a boy reaching, he's on a stool, reaching for a cookie, and the stool is ready to fall over. And she's reaching for the coquina gas in her hand, and she has her right finger up to her lip. There's a woman standing at the sink, drying dishes, and the sink is always flowing with water onto the floor. You just want the action. Mm hmm. Awesome. Good, thank you.
